```{r, include = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
#devtools::install_github("STAT325-S24/HistoryAmherstCollege")
library(HistoryAmherstCollege)
```

Here is an listing of the first ten chapters in the Table of Contents:

```{r, echo = FALSE}
head(history_toc, 10) |>
  select(chapter, page_number, title) |>
  kableExtra::kable(booktabs = TRUE, col.names = c("Chapter", "Page Number", "Subtitle"))
```

The following is an example of the cleaned text that is available in the `HistoryAmherstCollege` package.
The first part of Chapter 3 is shown below.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
history_text |>
  filter(chapter == "03") |>
  select(-chapter) |>
  kableExtra::kable(
    booktabs = TRUE, 
    col.names = c("Text", "Paragraph Number", "Page Number"))
```
